FROM pc_review WHERE date_format( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{time} AND review_state = 0 AND deleted = 0

SELECT pr.review_id, pr.review_state, pr.pc_user_id, pr.review_describe, pr.income_id, pr.rate_income_id, pr.user_id, pr.review_money, pr.alipay_account, pr.alipay_name, pr.create_time, pr.update_time, pr.deleted, pu.username, uu.nickname, ui.expenditure FROM pc_review pr LEFT JOIN pc_user pu ON pr.pc_user_id = pu.pc_user_id LEFT JOIN ums_user uu ON pr.user_id = uu.user_id LEFT JOIN ums_income ui ON pr.rate_income_id = ui.income_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
